pullrequest.title: Update control sync tutorial sample code and launch file to work with atlas v4/v5

content.raw:
The `rx` packages have been EOLed in groovy and are not supported / released anymore.

`rqt_plot` should be perfectly able to show multiple values (at least it was doing that fine some time ago).
Are the values visible when manually zooming out?
Have you checked all available options to change the view automatically based on the current value range?
Have you checked that the values are actually being published (e.g. using `rostopic echo`).

If non of this makes it work you might want to fill a ticket against the plugin.
But please make sure to describe a minimal reproducible example in the ticket.
content.html:
The rx packages have been EOLed in groovy and are not supported / released anymore.

rqt_plot should be perfectly able to show multiple values (at least it was doing that fine some time ago). Are the values visible when manually zooming out? Have you checked all available options to change the view automatically based on the current value range? Have you checked that the values are actually being published (e.g. using rostopic echo).

If non of this makes it work you might want to fill a ticket against the plugin. But please make sure to describe a minimal reproducible example in the ticket.
